content: X-BW MC Batwing Batwing hanger for attaching single MC/AC cables, EMTs and rigid conduits to drop rods, wires or beam flanges ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Tool-free installation – safer and easier to handle Versatile – one solution for tubing, conduits and cables Non-slip hold – batwing grips firmly to the drop rod, wire or flange Applications Attaching metal-clad or armored (type MC/AC) cables to a drop rod, wire or beam flange Attaching EMT conduits to a drop rod, wire or flange ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings Material: Carbon steel Base materials: Concrete Technical Data | Application | Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings | Material | Carbon steel | Base materials | Concrete | Approvals (global) | UL | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | MC cable capacity (max) | 1 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2245639 - Batwing clip X-BW 1 - Package Size 100 pc - 2245637 - Batwing clip X-BW 1/2 - Package Size 100 pc - 2245638 - Batwing clip X-BW 3/4 - Package Size 100 pc - 2245636 - Batwing clip X-BW W - Package Size 200 pc
